Name: MEMORISE : CREATION
About the game: Finally, you escaped from home. And then, you face the wildness. Now there are not any supports or friends named 'Parents' Can you really walk alone? Be careful about homesick, because you can't go back home! [Game Features] Creation Puzzle Platformer. Touch everything! If you touch something, you can create it! Touch and make a way to reach goal. Physics glitch is recommended. You rule everything! if you use physics glitches, it means that glitch becomes a law. Challenge to less creation and collect all stars!
